about_the_game: In Tedram Online you can take part in electrifying races against players from around the world, on different types of tracks, customize your car the way you want and upgrade it to make it faster. In your free time, work with your friends or do other jobs to earn money to spend on your cars. In Tedram you can transform ordinary cars into extraordinary racing machines. With a wide range of parts and accessories, customize everything from the engine to the paintwork. Create unique designs and optimize your vehicle's performance to dominate the tracks. Earn money by completing various jobs spread across the city. Whether delivering goods, acting as a getaway driver in robberies, or winning clandestine races, there is always a way to fill your pockets and earn respect. When you have enough money buy a house to hide illicit things or weapons.
detailed_description: In Tedram Online you can take part in electrifying races against players from around the world, on different types of tracks, customize your car the way you want and upgrade it to make it faster. In your free time, work with your friends or do other jobs to earn money to spend on your cars. In Tedram you can transform ordinary cars into extraordinary racing machines. With a wide range of parts and accessories, customize everything from the engine to the paintwork. Create unique designs and optimize your vehicle's performance to dominate the tracks. Earn money by completing various jobs spread across the city. Whether delivering goods, acting as a getaway driver in robberies, or winning clandestine races, there is always a way to fill your pockets and earn respect. When you have enough money buy a house to hide illicit things or weapons.
name: Tedram Online: Car Racing & Customization

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 OR AMD RX 470
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1070

short_description: In Tedram Online you can take part in electrifying races against players from around the world, on different types of tracks, customize your car the way you want and upgrade it to make it faster. In your free time, work with your friends or do other jobs to earn money to spend on your cars.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
